title: Why can't some BTS and Kpop fans accept that other people don't like BTS and Kpop? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two possibilities: For the same reason some people with a sweet tooth don’t accept that other people might not like cookies; you love something so intensely that it seems impossible for others to not feel the same way.I’d say pretty much all kpop fans accept that other people don’t like kpop, but the issue is what comes after someone has said “I don’t like kpop” because it’s usually offensive in a way. I’ve heard “I don’t like kpop because it’s stupid/gross/weird.” Since that’s usually the case people get defensive and don’t accept the way you said it.They accept that you dislike it but they don’t accept the way you said it.

I am not actually a Kpop fan before and listen more of western music, I have friends who likes Kpop or Jpop and when they recommend to listen on this song I would humbly accept it and tell my opinion, of course it is my PERSONAL opinion and they will respect it. Its just that some people gets easily offended whenever someone rejects what they like. I think it depends on the person on how they will say that they do not like the genre or they are not a fan of it. As I said before, I am not a fan of KPOP before, but now I enjoy listening to their music. We don’t know what or when will others preference will change, so just chill out and don’t be bothered when someone said they are not a fan of what you like :)
